definition: a tax that is measured by the amount of business done (not on property or income from real estate), remove by cutting
details:
noun
- a tax that is measured by the amount of business done (not on property or income from real estate)
= synonyms: excise tax
verb
- remove by cutting
= example: remove by cutting
- remove by erasing or crossing out or as if by drawing a line
= synonyms: strike
- levy an excise tax on
